alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 7:59PM EST until January 04 at 5:24AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Major flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 30.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 30.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued 8 AM EST.
